website_summaries.verdict: Footlockers have a long history of serving soldiers; this best-seller is just as effective for anyone desiring a well-built trunk to store and organize belongings.
pros: Multiple colors available if using for fashion as well as function
Has a lock and 2 keys, and a clasp that can be padlocked
Excellent transport and storage trunk for college students and campers, with 2 wheels making it easy to pull
cons: Users report that the latch on the front is somewhat delicate and can bend easily
Wheels tend to get in the way when stacking trunks

customer_reviews.title: I need a refund!!
customer_reviews.text: I received multiple email requests to review this purchase but as my children didn’t get to go to Camp until recently, it had to wait. We were so excited to turn up at camp with the new. The trunks were picked up by each car and loaded onto trailers for delivery to the children’s cabin and the same was done at the end of Camp. I was therefore terrible upset that this trunk failed to serve us beyond this one outing. The hinge holding the lid to the body fell off. The handles look worn and surely will break off any minute were the trunk still usable. Absolutely worthless is my opinion of this trunk.
customer_reviews.author: olubunmi Segun

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but looks nice from the outside
customer_reviews.text: I had a Seward Trunk similar to this one when I was in college that I kept for many years and only lost during a flood/theft of my previous home. I grabbed up this one to replace it. It has larger wheels than the one I had, but the construction is overall cheaper than the old one. The inside of the trunk has an indentation to accommodate the larger wheels of this version. The rivets that bind the case together all poke through the inner lining of the trunk, leaving a lower quality appearance to the inner trunk. It's still good enough for what I wanted and does look nice closed though.
customer_reviews.author: George Hess

customer_reviews.title: Such a Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This was such a deal!!! My son's college advertised a similar product for twice the price with exactly the same specs. Why pay more? Seems very sturdy. I expect him to enjoy this trunk for many years. Came quickly in a huge box. I may order more just for me!! I'm daydreaming of putting travel stickers on it.
customer_reviews.author: Doubleks

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the trunk, but it lacks security
customer_reviews.text: This trunk is way nicer than I anticipated! Spacious & well built. It has rollers on the bottom, making it easy to move. It did, however, arrive locked with the keys inside. After fidgeting with it for 30 seconds, it easily opened. Sadly the locking mechanism doesn’t seem to work properly. Not a big deal to me, as I don’t need it to be locked. If you are purchasing for the locking aspect, you may not be satisfied. I think this type of lock could be prone to malfunction & definitely easy to get into without its key. That aside, I adore it! I added vinyl decals, and it makes a beautiful addition to my glam room!
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trunk for my dorm and after a year of storage and moving, it's just as sturdy and useful. I searched a bunch of different sites but this trunk was the best price! I keep it under my bed so I love that I can roll it out if I need something and the wheels come in SUPER handy when you have to transport it.
customer_reviews.author: GiEt

customer_reviews.title: Happy to get the box... broke the first week of use
customer_reviews.text: The product was to accompany my 12 year old to camp. She used it one week... at one camp. The entire front lock face broke. I'm not going to put a thousand word review to describe my disappointment... I'll simply say this. I won't buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Proud

customer_reviews.title: Great color, nice size, holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: This trunk is more attractive than I thought it would be. The color purple matches other items well, the chrome is attractive. It looks sturdy but not sure how long the handles will last. I love that it has wheels and they seem sturdy. There were no nicks or scratches on it when it arrived. The packaging was very protective. At first it seems small but it holds more than you think. But don’t fill it until you place it where you want it. I just don’t trust the handles.
customer_reviews.author: T. Troy

customer_reviews.title: A defect and locked out
customer_reviews.text: So, we ordered this trunk for camp. It arrived last night. With the keys locked inside. And no way to get them out. While we considered busting the lock just so that we would have something for this weekend, it also had a manufacturer's defect--one of the brackets was not properly secured and no hole had ever been punched for the missing rivet. So now the whole thing goes back and we'll be scrambling for a useable trunk. Whoever is selling/shipping these, it's probably not a great idea to stick the keys INSIDE the trunk and then lock it if you want people to be able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Toys and Games
customer_reviews.text: This a very nice trunk. Nice and sturdy, and the blue is a pretty color. I purchased it to store toys and games my grandsons play with when they visit. I used to store everything on an entertainment shelving unit. It always looked so messy! Now everything is in the trunk and out of sight. The boys can just roll the trunk to where ever they want to play!
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Trunk in Vegas and we live in OKC?!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve written- hoping to get this rushed to us at the address that was on the order. My daughter needed this for her dorm and school starts next week. Very disappointed. I’ve never had this happen and I’ve ordered a ton from Amazon. Delivered down the street yes, but not not another state.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a toy chest for my son. It was not as a big as I thought it would be. However, the aesthetics of it is perfect for what I was looking for. You get what you pay for here. It is not an item I would recommend buying if you want something that will last you many years. The material is not very sturdy. The surrounding area where the trunk locks is already lifting. It will not last us very long but it is doing its job as of now. My son loves it so I will keep it until it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Melany

customer_reviews.title: Can still be cut into...
customer_reviews.text: Apparently it's so easy to cut in to also. I had a Master Lock on it too and thriving people cut around it and got in my trunk. I'd like a replacement of the two pieces they cut.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Strictly for permanent storage only , unreliable hardware
customer_reviews.text: For permanent storage solution only , do not move them around , shipping & handling or use at travel purpose . The interior made by cheap, thin plywood at thickness of heavy duty carton box alike . The metal hardware is not operated smoothly , light weight not for open and shut or lock frequently .
customer_reviews.author: Maika

customer_reviews.title: This is a good looking product for the $
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking product for the $. The latch takes a while to figure out but that could be a good thing. Sits flat on the floor even though wheels are built in. DD loves the bright purple, the wheel end doesn't have a handle but the front (near latch) does. It was surprisingly light weight. Hardware seems sturdy and unlike competitor has 2 hinges. Perfect for camp and off-season cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Terri S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty purple, and pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Ok honestly I wasn't sure about buying this, because of all of the reviews saying it was very flimsy. Well, I took the risk anyway, and I am not disappointed. It's so pretty (purple) and my 32 pound toddler has jumped up and down on top of it on more than one occasion and it didn't give in or anything. Well worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dezaray

customer_reviews.title: It may be girly so watch out! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than I expected, but that’s a fail on my part. As a freshman in college this was perfect to move my things and keep my valuables stored during the school year. If you’re looking for a cheaper way to get a truck it’s durable and sturdy, I highly recommend. Although the inside lining may be a little bit more girly it could be for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Wrong measurement, strong smell
customer_reviews.text: 30 x 15.8 x 12.2 inches is what it says the dimensions are it isn’t. Update: the smell is so strong it’s not going away! I’m not sure if it’s from glue or what but it’s horrible.
customer_reviews.author: realpersonreviews

customer_reviews.title: I tried to return it and the company denied it- total piece of junk- do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!! Poorly made piece of junk. Used one time and the top lid broke off!!! I tried to return it and the company denied it- total piece of junk- do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Happy Granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one of these I have purchased. Both for granddaughters. They are using them now for their "treasure chest" and will use them later. A nice gift. Sturdy construction. Locks and latches are all secure. Wheels to tote around are a great addition! All corners are secured and reinforced with brackets. Very pleased. Colors are nice as well!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Looks so nice. I bought it to use as a coffee table instead of the cooler we had on-hand. I was surprised it didn't come damaged, seeing as it is a larger item. I like the wheels on it and the storage is super nice for the blanket storage. It matches the size given and is just right for our couch. I will probably buy another one for my camera equipment when I get the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a premium foot locker but I can't stomach $200 for a trunk. It is absolutely a great value for the price. Perfect for camp. I figure we will get many uses out of the trunk, for years to come. Will it last until my little girl goes to college? Maybe. But for less than $100, it doesn't need to be an heirloom.
customer_reviews.author: Bear City Dad

customer_reviews.title: Should have been 2 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a cute trunk, however needs handles on both ends also not well made. And really small can’t get much in it. 3 stars was really a stretch more like 2 Stars. I Returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: LadyFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money I guess
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money I guess, but the wheels actually roll inside the trunk (they are not just attached to the outside); meaning there is no covering between them and your clothes/ items inside the trunk. If these wheels roll through water - the wet wheel will get whatever is near it wet or muddy.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Great for dorm room
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star if it had handles at each end to carry. The wheels are great but it would have been better to have the option for it to be carried or pulled. hard moving with just the wheels up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the packaging!!! It was late also. I got this gift for my son for Christmas, something he's been asking for awhile now, and his Christmas gift is ruined. I cam home from work looking forward to see how it was packaged and it was a disaster, he ask me what is that pink box for? So i lied and said it was for my fiance , cuz she needed to store things and didn't have space, and he was like..oh ok. I took pictures of how it looks and okim really not happy! I guess I'll buy smaller items next time.
customer_reviews.author: strangeways

customer_reviews.title: As expected and a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is an graduation gift. I thought it was going to be just a bit longer but its exactly what I aiming for. Very fast shipping and I hope the graduate I got it for likes it. I had one for college and it was the best thing in my opinion to have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trunk for home or dorm-room storage
customer_reviews.text: This is the second trunk I ordered. My son loves his so much at boarding school that I ordered one for myself at home. Durable, & sturdy. Pricing is excellent compared to similar trunks that don't have wheels. Lock is easy to work with included key if you choose not to use a padlock. No doubt that both myself and my son will get many years of service out of these. To parents with students who live in a dorm: This fits nicely under my son's bed. The wheels will make it very easy for sliding out from under the bed and for moving when full. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Goalie Mom

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive, stylish storage
customer_reviews.text: the walls are a little thin and the plastic handles seem like they aren't the strongest, but I've used it on a half dozen photography shoots and nothing has broken yet. i do wish that it was a little longer to accommodate my full-size tripods, but i can't really fault the product for that. besides all that, it looks really cool! feels good showing up to a gig with this case; it looks really professional and stylish
customer_reviews.author: a7ropos

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Rubber foot fell off of the trunk within first month of ownership. Contacted company and they replied that they don't sell replacement parts with no other suggestions or solutions. Chinzy product and less than satisfying customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, customer service is excellent! We bought this trunk in blue as a gift for a High School graduate. Beautiful color. This trunk exceeded our expectations. Highly recommend, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gardener303

customer_reviews.title: Great trunks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these trunks to help organize my purses and Sorority items. The great thing about these trunks are the wheels. No lifting. Just roll it into place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trunk to use specifically for storage and helping me move things back and forth during college and it was exceptionally useful. It lasted me four years and never once gave me any problems. You're able to load this up with books, clothes, or other miscellaneous items it will be able to keep them safe and secure. I do not regret buying this trunk whatsoever because 4 years later I'm still using it and I still think this $50 I spent were worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking trunk for lightweight storage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a toy trunk for my son's room and plan on using it to store things when he outgrows it as a toy trunk. Wheels are handy and it is pretty sturdy. I wouldn't stand on it or anything but if taken care of, should hold up pretty well. Outside looks easy to wipe down but inside is paper over cardboard. Wouldn't get it wet. The handles don't look like they will withstand much pulling with a lot of weight in it. Perfect for storing lightweight larger objects.
customer_reviews.author: dmdanielle

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made! It doesn't have a hasp to put a padlock on, looks like there was one & it maybe fell off... the rivets look as though they can popped off without much effort with a butterknife! The thin plastic handle looks like it will break easily. I really expected a lot better quality for that price!
customer_reviews.author: MRush

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase but not that big
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy. Sat on it and it was very strong holding my 188lbs. Somewhat smaller then I thought. Not too deep or long. But love the fact that it has 4 wheels instead of just 2. But this was a reasonable cost to pay
customer_reviews.author: SaLove

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a footlocker to go away to camp and I searched and found this one for a great price even though it said it was used but like new. Everything was in amazing condition, the lock, the wheels and the whole footlocker were brand new. It was very sturdy and didn’t have any dents or chips. It arrived right when I expected it. Would definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: del

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chest
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as my daughter's 10th birthday gift. She loves it, loves the colour. Puts all her cute artsty stuff in it. Tries to hide her stuff from her lil sister. I hope she keeps it for as long as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed, defects, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this company 0 stars I would. I’ve ordered three trunks so far trying to get it right, one trunk came perfectly fine, the second came with the handle not bolted down, I ordered a replacement and it came with the wheels on the same side as the handle, leaving it impossible to actually utilize the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Homes4us

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, great color for use in a study.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trunk as a small coffee table in a room that I repainted and redecorated for my teenage daughters. It is difficult to find a coffee table this size, and the trunk is working great! Very easy to move thanks to the wheels. Love the color, vibrant. The extra storage is perfect for school books and papers.
customer_reviews.author: S. G. Cable

customer_reviews.title: the color is really bright which I actually really like, it locks the only thing that really bothered ...
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I was very skeptical because of the price, admittedly that it's not 'perfect' as I notice the smallest details of all my stuff. But it does what it needs too, the color is really bright which I actually really like, it locks the only thing that really bothered me was I could clearly see when looking inside, all the screws that was drilled into it for the handles and everything. It seems to be sturdy for the light use that I need it for. I am very pleased and pleasantly surprised by how nice it really is. Especially for such a cheap price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I Imagined
customer_reviews.text: Though the product description included the dimensions, I was a bit disappointed by the amount of things I could fit inside. I moved across the country with it and it did a great job protecting all my stuff. It was a hassle to carry in the airport because the handle is only attached to the top and will not adjust heights. I am rather tall, and that proved to be problematic. I kept kicking it and tripping over it as I walked. However, now that I am settled down, this doubles as a quality storage chest. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as described. I saw other reviewers complain this is not "wood" but cardboard. First line of description states "MDF" construction, which is particle board. Yes this is constructed of particle board. But is sturdy enough to do the job. Arrived well packaged, and undamaged. It does weigh 20lbs empty, so the wheels are a very nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buckert

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't fabulous, but did the job.
customer_reviews.text: The case did the job we needed it for summer camp this year. And I suspect it would last a few more summer camps as well - but this is certainly not going to be an heirloom trunk. ;-) The metal latches and walls seem like they are just ok quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: 1) The black trim around the edges is plastic, not metal. 2) Some of the rivets poke through the inside.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: not the sturdy leather-bound trunks from yesteryear
customer_reviews.text: It's a typical modern trunk, modern, as in made with somewhat flimsy cardboard/press-board, not the sturdy leather-bound trunks from yesteryear. I don't think it will stand up to 4 years of college moves, but will do for the first year for storage. I do like the wheels; makes it so much easier to move.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I order four of them!!! They came in different boxes. They did not come with wheels! See pictures. I have no way of returning them at this time. The easy open is a joke ... a flat head screw driver can open them. Save your money....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: The day I needed to drop my son to his college campus the handle broke. I do not know if it came broken or broke that day but I was praying it wouldn’t break all the way and he would have to carry it with all the other equipment he had. I wish I could return it and get a new one but he is in A regimental college in NY and I am in Fl. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Johanna a rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great value, worth buying cause after you use it for travel you can use it for storage store bedding or anything really.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne M.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Storage
customer_reviews.text: For my use I find this to ge ex’ what I needed. I probably wouldn’t recommend using as an ottoman for sitting or putting ones feet up regularly.its made out of an extremely heavy duty cardboard. So keep water away. But if you just need stylish storage like I did. This is great. I use it to store my banking supplies and it stores a lot while still allowing the lid to close.
customer_reviews.author: LoveLeaMell

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe the price for something so large!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a fun nightstand for the new bedroom I’m doing. With limited space it’s the perfect piece!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to keep lid open from falling back.
customer_reviews.text: The lid of the locker doesn't have a strap to keep it up. It falls back and messes up the hinges. Then the lid doesn't shut properly. It needs something to hold it from falling back and messing up the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Howard B.

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: We love the color, the wheels & the storage. It did come in a touch damaged with one end of the trunk having the metal corners smashed. It did not effect the function, so we kept it the way it was.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Good trunk for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son to take to sleep-away camp. It holds a ton of stuff and is easy to transport with the wheels. The only issue we had is the lid feels a little loose, but it doesn't seem like it's about to come free from the hinges.
customer_reviews.author: t_ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Good for college bound person
customer_reviews.text: The lock didn't work easily but once you "figured out the knack) it does OK. The trunk is sturdy and is ideal to take/store clothing and supplies in a college room.
customer_reviews.author: Russ S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice trunk, but hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this trunk for my daughter to take to a college program in the summer. We thought it would be easy to handle since it has wheels, however the handle is just a typical trunk handle and you have to bend over and herniate yourself to pull it with the wheels! Plus, the handle feels as if it will break if you pull too hard. This trunk needs a handle similar to a suitcase, which comes out and lets you walk and pull at the same time. The trunk might as well not have wheels at all. We had to carry it around! Cute looking though, and roomy enough.
customer_reviews.author: lakelady

customer_reviews.title: Not for a perfectionist but overall sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Interior is not perfect. You can see where rivots popped through the paper lining but who really looks that close after it is filled and used.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great for college.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son to store things in his college dorm. I love that it has wheels. I just wish that they would make it with stronger material. It looks like thin particle board. It's the same as most trunks.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Trunk
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves her new trunk. Its all she's been talking about. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This trunk seems sturdy and well built, but not as much as other very old ones I have. But it is more than adequate. The purple colour is much lighter than in the picture, if that matters to you. It locks well. To be more secure, use a padlock. Overall I am very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Jamerson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & easily rolls
customer_reviews.text: In the process of moving. Going to put things in it that we want to secure. Then in our new place it will be used in the grandchildren’s room for storage. That’s why we got pink!! It seems sturdy and is made well. Arrived with no dents or dings.
customer_reviews.author: T. CHAPMAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice trunk
customer_reviews.text: Great trunk. It should do the job for years. The wheels help a lot in moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its great,, I can put feet Up or have an extra place to sit.. Sit
customer_reviews.text: I love my trunk,, I don't have much storage space in my one bedroom apartment and this is the idea compartment to put my 2blankets and 2pillows in keep them nice and clean..
customer_reviews.author: Christine Shewmake

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: For those thinking the trunk is locked and keys inside, just push on the black button and it will open. Nice trunk
customer_reviews.author: S. Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Great foot locker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great foot locker. This is the second one that I’ve bought for my 2 grandsons They loved them
customer_reviews.author: C. Lipinski Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good for your important documents or collectibles.
customer_reviews.text: WISH I KNEW THE SIZE BEFORE ORDERING, BUT IT WILL SERVE THE PURPOSE. THX FOR THE QUICK DELIVERY.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dalen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for college students
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 trunks for my college bound son. They shipped fast and were in easy to open boxes. The are sturdy and hold a lot of clothes and shoes. I especially like the fact that they came with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Super cool and secure
customer_reviews.text: Great box to store all those naughty bedroom toys so the kids dont find them again
customer_reviews.author: oc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for locking sons toys up when needed to have them taken away!
customer_reviews.author: The Parks

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, Flimsy, Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: This trunk was TERRIBLE. My daughter took it to camp and it broke on the way. It is flimsy, cheaply made and will not withstand any camp experience, let alone travel. DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: don'tmesswithtexas

customer_reviews.title: Good for college students
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has wheels and is like a foot locker. It has multiple uses and can be moved any time. I also like the colors
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Goku Trunks
customer_reviews.text: Can fit A LOT and the wheels are great. Made it through the moving truck with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kabi

customer_reviews.title: Great purple color
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for daughter to take to summer camp. She loves it. My only complaint is the lock is flimsy. Great purple color.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Quality made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed. Lots of storage space. I was amazed with how much i could get into it. I love the wheels and handles. It helps moving it around that much easier and safer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It will get the job done
customer_reviews.text: This was affordable, but didn’t have two handles for carrying. Material was not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Asmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing out of season clothing
customer_reviews.text: We saw one of these at a yard sale and I convinced my daughter not to pay $50 for what was clearly a well-used trunk. She was much happier with a new one via amazon and uses it for out-of-season clothing. The wheels are a nice touch although the trunk pretty much stays put.
customer_reviews.author: disneynut59

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Trunk to Buy
customer_reviews.text: has wheels on the bottom if you use the side handle-user friendly. 2 keys inside latches keep the dysfunctional robber out using the lock provided can use your own lock on the center latch plenty of room provided that side handle is something else. it makes the whole trunk user friendly especially when your a woman and can't lift a full packed trunk
customer_reviews.author: The Brute

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when it arrived and it arrived extra early. I use it to put my snacks in and keys came with it. No one can access it but me. Very roomy. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Lakeisha Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It's a good trunk. I know people who have trunks that ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why most of the reviews on here are complaining about the exposed wheels on the inside. It's really not that big of a deal at all, you hardly notice them if you're stacking clothes and what not on top of them. It's a good trunk. I know people who have trunks that are around $300 and also have the wheels exposed on the inside of the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bohlender

customer_reviews.title: Box is not very durable but otherwise meets all of our needs for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Sent our child to camp with this, we learned that it cannot take a heavy beating! Otherwise it was perfect for our needs. It slides easily under camp bunk beds and rolls well.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price!
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price, but not made with quality materials!
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough for sleep-away camp. Doubt anyone would want to use this for everyday use long term.
customer_reviews.author: B.Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great trunk, affordably priced
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of this trunk for the price. The lock is a little tricky for me but I will use a padlock so I am not concerned with it. I love that wheels are built in making moving it very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It is a case. It locks. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.text: No, it does not do taxes, or laundry, and it got pissed when I tried to make it mow my lawn. However, holding stuff and locking? It does that very well.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Alril
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gift. Niece loved it. Got it at age 13. She is now 19. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughter and going away to college. She loved it! One small thing was I couldn't get the little lock to open but finally did, no other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great college trunk, looks good under bed.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. Good price and you do need to buy a lock for it as anything could turn the "lock" that it comes with. Bought for college student, works great and fits under their dorm bed and in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Keep it away from water and it is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 5 years and I'm just writing a review. Keep it away from water and it is amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ss_88

customer_reviews.title: Best Price!
customer_reviews.text: This trunk saved the day! My daughter needed this for college but the prices were through the roof! This is very sturdy we sat on it and got tossed around on a 20 hour drive. It does have wheels and holds quite a few things.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflowersdc

customer_reviews.title: perfect for storage
customer_reviews.text: it came three days early!! i love this trunk i got it to hold my stuff for college. its so spacious
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Fine, a value, functional
customer_reviews.text: Coincidentally this was packaged so well that I have kept the packaging for the future shipment of this product. I bought it for moving states. Upon examination it is a quality product but if I had known how much craftsmanship went into a trunk I would have bought a finer one. I expect this one to last a few moves or a decade, which ever comes first. Sticker from tourist cafe stuck cleanly to surface!
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. Ordered for my 8 year old daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Ordered for my 8 year old daughter to keep things from her baby sister so they don’t get lost or broken. Has helped so much. Great quality! Great color!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Roose

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to take to college, first year (2018). She’s uses it at a storage a table and a chair. Very sturdy, holds up well while moving back and forth to college. It’s still going strong it’s now 2020.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot and great price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and the size is great and the price was even better. The grey is more of a blue grey but that was ok by me.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Great for college
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for my daughters dorm room and fit quite a bit. Only issue i had was the tracking number we were given but item arrived on time and was a great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered it I expected far less out of it but it turns out it has a whole Lotta space very beautiful looking definitely would order this product again
customer_reviews.author: Stephenbailey

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as she left for college. The wheels are perfect and made her move so much more smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Atoro

customer_reviews.title: Loving the purple color and pricing
customer_reviews.text: The wheels take up some of the space but for the price it's perfect. I hope it last as my last ones are 50 yrs old
customer_reviews.author: dancemom

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road trunk
customer_reviews.text: Middle of the road storage trunk. Perfect for a dorm at college.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: The wheels made it the perfect gift for my college student
customer_reviews.text: The trunk has alot of storage space. The wheels made it the perfect gift for my college student. It is easy to roll and store after use.
customer_reviews.author: M Reid

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Arrived swiftly and better than described. I love the wheels. Makes for easy transport.
customer_reviews.author: OBrien

product_meta.title: Seward Trunk Rover
product_meta.description:
Wheeled Storage Locker Trunk. Great footlocker storage with maximum style. Heavy vinyl covered wood construction with dirt and moisture resistant tongue and groove trim. Keyed lock and hasp for purchased padlock. Durable wooden construction Heavy gauge vinyl covering High impact styrene binding Nickel hardware Easy to open push-button key lock Plastic handles Dust & moisture resistant tongue & groove closure Two recessed wheels Materials: Vinyl covered wood Dimensions: 30" L x 15.75" W x 12.25" H; 18 lbs

 * Product Dimensions :15.75 x 30 x 12.25 inches; 18 Pounds
 * Item model number :SWD6113-18
 * Department :Unisex-adult

 * Manufacturer :Advantus
 * ASIN :B004IUAFDK

Heavy vinyl covered wood construction with dirt and moisture resistant tongue and groove trim. Keyed lock and hasp for purchased padlock. Durable wooden construction Heavy gauge vinyl covering High impact styrene binding Nickel hardware Easy to open push-button key lock Plastic handles Dust & moisture resistant tongue & groove closure Two recessed wheels Materials: Vinyl covered wood Dimensions: 30" L x 15.75" W x 12.25" H; 18 lbs

Durable recessed wheels for easy moving
